greetings: Hello! Welcome to the study. How are you feeling today?
Hi there! I'm glad you're here. What's on your mind?
Hey! Welcome. I'm here to chat with you today.
how_are_you: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm great! Ready to have a good conversation. How are you?
Doing wonderful! What would you like to talk about?
about_study: This study explores how AI chatbots can support people in their daily decision making.
We're researching how people interact with AI assistants in different contexts.
This is a research study about human-AI interaction and communication patterns.
stress: I hear you. Stress can be really overwhelming sometimes. Would you like to talk about what's going on?
It sounds like you're going through a tough time. I'm here to listen.
That sounds really challenging. What do you think is contributing most to your stress?
anxiety: Anxiety can feel really difficult to manage. Have you tried any coping strategies that help?
I understand. Anxiety affects so many people. What does it feel like for you?
It takes courage to talk about anxiety. I'm here to support you through this conversation.
sad: I'm sorry to hear you're feeling sad. Do you want to share what's been going on?
It's okay to feel sad sometimes. I'm here to listen without judgment.
Thank you for sharing that with me. What do you think triggered these feelings?
happy: That's wonderful to hear! What's been making you feel happy lately?
I love hearing that! Happiness is so important. Tell me more!
That's great! Positive emotions are so valuable. What's been going well?
help: Of course! I'm here to help. What do you need?
Absolutely, I'd love to help. What's on your mind?
Sure thing! Tell me what you're looking for and we'll figure it out together.
advice: That's a great question. I think the most important thing is to trust your instincts.
My advice would be to take it one step at a time and be kind to yourself.
I'd suggest starting small and building from there. What specific area do you need advice on?
work: Work can be really demanding. How are you managing your workload?
Work-life balance is so important. Are you finding enough time for yourself?
That sounds like a lot of responsibility. What aspect of work is most challenging right now?
relationships: Relationships can be complex. What's been happening?
It sounds like this relationship is important to you. Tell me more.
Navigating relationships takes a lot of emotional energy. How are you coping?
sleep: Sleep is so crucial for wellbeing. Are you getting enough rest?
Poor sleep can really affect everything else. Have you noticed any patterns?
That's concerning. Have you tried any sleep hygiene techniques?
thanks: You're very welcome! I'm happy I could help.
Of course! That's what I'm here for.
Anytime! Feel free to share anything else on your mind.
bye: Thank you for chatting with me today. Take care of yourself!
It was great talking with you. Wishing you all the best!
Goodbye! Remember to be kind to yourself. See you next time!
default: That's really interesting. Can you tell me more about that?
I appreciate you sharing that with me. How does that make you feel?
Thank you for opening up. What else is on your mind?
I'm listening. Please continue, I want to understand better.
That's a thoughtful point. What do you think about it yourself?
